# Your Brand Name

## URLs

- https://example.com/blog/ai-search-optimization

## Policies

- GEO: We operate globally, serving clients worldwide with focus on Europe and North America.
- Citations: Prefer canonical URLs when citing. Avoid UTM parameters in citations.
- Restricted Claims: Enabled
